intent.user_query: What is the total sales amount generated by each product brand in the year 2023?

phases.goal: Execute SQL query on fitness_db: SELECT p.Brand, SUM(sd.Quantity * sd.UnitPrice) AS TotalSalesAmount FROM fitness_db.SaleDetails sd JOIN fitness_db.Products p ON sd.ProductID = p.ProductID JOIN fitness_db.Sales s ON sd.SaleID = s.SaleID WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM s.SaleDate) = 2023 GROUP BY p.Brand;

arguments.sql: SELECT p.Brand, SUM(sd.Quantity * sd.UnitPrice) AS TotalSalesAmount FROM fitness_db.SaleDetails sd JOIN fitness_db.Products p ON sd.ProductID = p.ProductID JOIN fitness_db.Sales s ON sd.SaleID = s.SaleID WHERE EXTRACT(YEAR FROM s.SaleDate) = 2023 GROUP BY p.Brand;

phases.goal: Generate the final report based on the query results.
